laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial level was 25 µg/ml (normal = 10-20), repeat level on discharge was 9 µg/ml.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The phenytoin level decreased from 25 µg/ml to 9 µg/ml after dosage reduction.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial level was 36 µg/ml (normal = 15-30), repeat level on discharge was 16 µg/ml.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The primidone level decreased from 36 µg/ml to 16 µg/ml after dosage reduction.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Moderate slow wave activity without evidence of an epileptic focus.
Initial level was 9 µg/ml; repeat level was 43 µg/ml upon worsening of psychosis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The phenytoin level increased from 9 µg/ml to 43 µg/ml before the dosage was decreased.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial level was 6 µg/ml; repeat level was 6 µg/ml.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The primidone level remained stable at 6 µg/ml.
